member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_INFO
member.summary: The OCSP_REQUEST_INFO structure contains information for an online certificate status protocol (OCSP) request as specified by RFC 2560. The RFC specifies that a single request can contain a sequence of certificates for which statuses are required. The rgRequestEntry member of this structure contains an structure for each certificate in a sequence.

summary.para: A value that indicates the protocol version of the OCSP request.

member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_INFO.pRequestorName
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that contains the name bound to the certificate public key of the requester.

member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_INFO.cRequestEntry
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgRequestEntry array.

member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_INFO.rgRequestEntry
member.summary: An array of pointers to structures.

member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_INFO.cExtension
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgExtension array.

member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_INFO.rgExtension
member.summary: An array of pointers to structures, each of which contains information about the request.
